Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I believe it aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
